ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeaslesLowTransmissionV.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD2DTMeaslesLowTransmission ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#No measles primary series doses were administered-127
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months-42

ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeaslesLowTransmissionV.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD2DTMeaslesLowTransmission ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeaslesLowTransmissionVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
